title: The Inaugural Sungrow GRES 2024 Summit: Charting the Course for the Worldwide Zero-Carbon Transition
summary: The article discusses the advancements and importance of renewable energy integration, focusing on technologies and innovations in the field.
green_innovation: TRUE - The article highlights the advancements in renewable energy technologies and innovations that can contribute to environmental sustainability goals such as decarbonization and promoting renewable energy sources.

likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 221114 (Solar Electric Power Generation), 221115 (Wind Electric Power Generation), 221119 (Other Electric Power Generation), 221122 (Electric Power Distribution)
